item.title: Constant banging noise, 30th October
item.description:
Constant loud banging noise, likely from upstairs, every day and night until 3–4 a.m. It’s happening now (8:55 p.m.). My baby wakes up and my 7-year-old gets scared. We can’t sleep and it’s affecting our wellbeing. Please investigate and stop this noise.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Warwick Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping outside my house, 30th October
item.description:
People have been flytipping outside my house for some weeks. There is a sink, a hob, a sideboard, a bit, some wooden boards and other household waste items. They're all leaned up against the back of my house which is 24 Watts Street. Other people have now started adding rubbish to the pile and it's a complete state. I've tried asking neighbours but noone knows who is doing this. It's unsafe for the children and animals on the block. I hope this can be dealt with quickly. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Watts Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
